subs.text: @siegel That whole video made me cringe for the better part of an hour. It was 15 minutes worth of content with scripted gestures, contrived CGI, bad music, and plastic presenters filling the rest. I hope Apple doesn't ever do that again.

subs.text: @brentsimmons Any tool or service that helps the free and unhindered dissemination of news and information to Russia is a service to all mankind. Pulling it is not only a "me too" gestures, but one that damages the ability for the truth to be know.  Stop overthinking this and leave it alone!

subs.text: @b05crypto Save your breath. People like @SenWarren  are fear mongering for personal gain, pandering to a group of financial Luddites in an echo chamber that they can't hear reason in. She doesn't WANT to understand as it would show she's been wrong all along.
